name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing high-performance solutions utilizing **Golang**, **Node.js**, **Redis**, **ClickHouse**, and **TypeScript**. Proven expertise in building scalable microservices architectures and real-time analytics applications alongside proficiency with **PHP**, **Laravel**, and **Vue3**. I have effectively managed technical projects by employing CI/CD practices via **GitHub Actions** and orchestrating containerized applications with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**.

My strong background includes leading teams and guiding project development while adhering to high compliance standards in areas like ***fraud detection***, ***data aggregation***, and real-time data processing. I bring familiarity with cloud platforms, monitoring tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, and robust experience deploying applications in production environments following best practices and utilizing tools such as **Nginx**, **Kafka**, and **SSP/DSP** frameworks. I am committed to delivering innovative solutions that enhance operational efficiency and drive successful outcomes.
